Detailed Description

Internal interface used to scan the OBEX Server Registry.

Warning;
This is an internal interface which must not be used outside APOXI OBEX at all.

In order to facilitate dispatching of incoming requests by TARGET header, MIME type and possibly other criteria servers must register with a central Server Registry. This registry assigns each server a system-wide unique id, the ObexServerId. Furthermore, it provides the infrastructure for mapping incoming requests onto server id's by employing a Visitor Pattern.

This class represents the abstract Visitor class of the Visitor Pattern. Concrete implementations must overwrite at least one of the Visit...() methods. When searching the Server Registry for a server meeting certain conditions, a Visit...() method should return 'TRUE' when the conditions are met, i.e. a matching server was found. This will tell the ObexServerMngr::Iterate() method to stop iterating over registry entries an return the ObexServerId of the matching server.

See also:
ObexServerMngr

ObexServerInfo
